channel.title: How to: Making Global Objects teleport you?
channel.description:
Hello,
I have made a few global objects, here and there, but now I would like to know how I can make them teleport me somewhere?
Thanks

item.title: How to: Making Global Objects teleport you?
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.source: How to: Making Global Objects teleport you?

item.title: How to: Making Global Objects teleport you?
item.dc:creator: @Y0_J0k3r Y0_J0k3r
item.description:
@Y0_J0k3r wrote:

case 2469: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You teleport to jad"); teleportToX = 3105; teleportToY = 3933; actionTimer = 20; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break;

This is what I use, just change the case number to the object you want it to be used.

Read full topic
